remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支持数据绑定体系结构，使 Web 服务器控件能够绑定到数据并以一致的方式呈现数据。ASP.NET supports a data-binding architecture that enables Web server controls to bind to data and present it in a consistent fashion. 将绑定到数据的 web 服务器控件调用数据绑定控件并促成这种绑定的类称为数据源控件。Web server controls that bind to data are called data-bound controls, and the classes that facilitate that binding are called data source controls. 数据源控件可以表示任何数据源： 文件、 流、 关系数据库、 业务对象等。Data source controls can represent any data source: a file, a stream, a relational database, a business object, and so on. 数据源控件数据绑定控件，而不考虑源或基础数据的格式一致的方式呈现数据。Data source controls present data in a consistent way to data-bound controls, regardless of the source or format of the underlying data. 表示分层数据的数据源控件派生自抽象类。Data source controls that represent hierarchical data derive from the abstract class. 您可以将数据源控件作为数据源控件对象和其关联的视图由数据源视图对象表示对基础数据的组合。You can think of a data source control as the combination of the data source control object and its associated views on the underlying data, which are represented by data source view objects. 分层数据源控件支持它们所表示的数据的每个层次结构级别的分层数据源视图。Hierarchical data source controls support a hierarchical data source view for each hierarchical level of data they represent. 数据源视图未命名，如与关联的对象控件，但由其唯一的分层路径标识。The data source views are not named, like the objects associated with a control, but are identified by their unique hierarchical path. 数据源视图定义的数据源控件的功能。Data source views define the capabilities of a data source control. 所有数据源视图对象，包括，支持从基础数据源使用的数据检索方法，检索的数据作为层次结构列表对象。All data source view objects, including , support data retrieval from the underlying data source using the method, which retrieves a hierarchical list of data as an object. 所有数据都源视图对象选择性地支持一组基本的功能，包括操作，如， ， ，和排序。All data source view objects optionally support a basic set of capabilities, including operations such as , , , and sorting. 数据绑定控件可以发现数据源控件通过检索关联的数据源的功能查看使用方法，并在设计时或在运行时查询视图。A data-bound control can discover the capabilities of a data source control by retrieving an associated data source view using the method and querying the view at design time or at run time. 当前不支持，或操作。 does not currently support , or operations. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生类类来检索数据，从层次结构数据存储，在这种情况下的文件系统。The following code example demonstrates how to derive a class from the class to retrieve data from hierarchical data storage, in this case a file system. `FileSystemDataSourceView`类是强类型化实例启用层次结构的 Web 服务器控件，例如要绑定到控件`FileSystemDataSource`控件并显示文件系统信息。The `FileSystemDataSourceView` class is a strongly typed instance that enables hierarchical Web server controls such as the control to bind to a `FileSystemDataSource` control and display file system information. 出于安全目的，文件系统信息在 localhost 中正在使用的数据源控件时，才会显示、 身份验证方案中，并仅启动使用数据源控件的 Web 窗体页所驻留的虚拟目录。For security purposes, file system information is displayed only if the data source control is being used in a localhost, authenticated scenario, and only starts with the virtual directory that the Web Forms page using the data source control resides in. 否则为`viewPath`参数传递给构造函数可能用于创建基于当前的文件系统路径的视图。Otherwise, the `viewPath` parameter passed to the constructor might be used to create a
